variables.name: EEPROM_STATUS
variables.comment: The status of the VCU's EEPROM. 0 => Hardware failure, 1 => Memory invalid, 3 => Memory valid.

variables.name: APPS_1_ABS_MIN
variables.comment: The absolute minimum plausible sample of APPS-1. Any lower indicates a fault condition.

variables.name: APPS_1_REQ_MIN
variables.comment: The starting sample at which APPS-1 begins requesting torque.

variables.name: APPS_1_REQ_MAX
variables.comment: The ending sample at which APPS-1 stops requesting torque.

variables.name: APPS_1_ABS_MAX
variables.comment: The absolute maximum plausible sample of APPS-1. Any higher indicates a fault condition.

variables.name: APPS_2_ABS_MIN
variables.comment: The absolute minimum plausible sample of APPS-2. Any lower indicates a fault condition.

variables.name: APPS_2_REQ_MIN
variables.comment: The starting sample at which APPS-2 begins requesting torque.

variables.name: APPS_2_REQ_MAX
variables.comment: The ending sample at which APPS-2 stops requesting torque.

variables.name: APPS_2_ABS_MAX
variables.comment: The absolute maximum plausible sample of APPS-2. Any higher indicates a fault condition.

variables.name: BSE_F_ABS_MIN
variables.comment: The absolute minimum plausible sample of BSE-F. Any lower indicates a fault condition.

variables.name: BSE_F_REQ_MIN
variables.comment: The starting sample of the linear range of BSE-F.

variables.name: BSE_F_REQ_MAX
variables.comment: The ending sample of the linear range of BSE-F.

variables.name: BSE_F_ABS_MAX
variables.comment: The absolute maximum plausible sample of BSE-F. Any higher indicates a fault condition.

variables.name: BSE_R_ABS_MIN
variables.comment: The absolute minimum plausible sample of BSE-R. Any lower indicates a fault condition.

variables.name: BSE_R_REQ_MIN
variables.comment: The starting sample of the linear range of BSE-R.

variables.name: BSE_R_REQ_MAX
variables.comment: The ending sample of the linear range of BSE-R.

variables.name: BSE_R_ABS_MAX
variables.comment: The absolute maximum plausible sample of BSE-R. Any higher indicates a fault condition.

variables.name: DRIVING_TORQUE_LIMIT
variables.comment: The cumulative driving (positive) torque limit, in Nm.

variables.name: TORQUE_ALGORITHM_INDEX
variables.comment: The index of the torque-vectoring algorithm to use. 0 => Straight-diff, 1 => Linear-steering, 2 => Linear-steering Slalom, 3 => Single-tire-fire (left), 4 => Single-tire-fire (right).

variables.name: POWER_LIMIT
variables.comment: The cumulative power limit of the vehicle, in W.

variables.name: POWER_LIMIT_PID_KP
variables.comment: The proportional coefficient of the power limit PID, in 1/W.

variables.name: POWER_LIMIT_PID_KI
variables.comment: The integral coefficient of the power limit PID, in 1/Ws.

variables.name: POWER_LIMIT_PID_KD
variables.comment: The derivative coefficient of the power limit PID, in s/W.

variables.name: POWER_LIMIT_PID_A
variables.comment: The measurement gain of the power limit PID, in range [0, 1)

variables.name: GLV_BATTERY_SAMPLE_11V5
variables.comment: The ADC sample of the GLV battery at 11.5V.

variables.name: GLV_BATTERY_SAMPLE_14V4
variables.comment: The ADC sample of the GLV battery at 14.4V.

variables.name: SAS_SAMPLE_OFFSET
variables.comment: The sample of the steering angle sensor at the zero position, minus 2048.

variables.name: SAS_SAMPLE_NEGATIVE
variables.comment: The sample of the steering angle sensor at the negative-most position.

variables.name: SAS_SAMPLE_POSITIVE
variables.comment: The sample of the steering angle sensor at the positive-most position.

variables.name: SAS_ANGLE_NEGATIVE
variables.comment: The steering angle of the vehicle at the negative-most position.

variables.name: SAS_ANGLE_POSITIVE
variables.comment: The steering angle of the vehicle at the positive-most position.

variables.name: SAS_DEADZONE_RANGE
variables.comment: The range of the steering angle deadzone, centered around the zero position.

variables.name: SD_FR_BIAS
variables.comment: The front-to-rear bias of the straight-diff algorithm (1 => 100% rear, 0 => 100% front).

variables.name: SD_LR_BIAS
variables.comment: The left-to-right bias of the straight-diff algorithm (1 => 100% left, 0 => 100% right).

variables.name: LS_WHEEL_SPEED_BIAS_BEGIN
variables.comment: The wheel speed at which the front-to-rear bias starts shifting from the beginning value.

variables.name: LS_WHEEL_SPEED_BIAS_END
variables.comment: The wheel speed at which the front-to-rear bias stops shifting to the end value.

variables.name: LS_FR_BIAS_BEGIN
variables.comment: The front-to-rear bias at the beginning wheel speed.

variables.name: LS_FR_BIAS_END
variables.comment: The front-to-rear bias at the ending wheel speed.

variables.name: LS_STEERING_ANGLE_BEGIN
variables.comment: The steering angle at which the left-to-right bias starts shifting from 50/50.

variables.name: LS_STEERING_ANGLE_END
variables.comment: The steering angle at which the left-to-right bias stops shifting to the end value.

variables.name: LS_LR_BIAS_END
variables.comment: The left-to-right bias at the ending steering angle.

variables.name: LSS_WHEEL_SPEED_BIAS_BEGIN
variables.comment: The wheel speed at which the front-to-rear bias starts shifting from the beginning value.

variables.name: LSS_WHEEL_SPEED_BIAS_END
variables.comment: The wheel speed at which the front-to-rear bias stops shifting to the end value.

variables.name: LSS_FR_BIAS_BEGIN
variables.comment: The front-to-rear bias at the beginning wheel speed.

variables.name: LSS_FR_BIAS_END
variables.comment: The front-to-rear bias at the ending wheel speed.

variables.name: LSS_STEERING_ANGLE_BEGIN
variables.comment: The steering angle at which the left-to-right bias starts shifting from 50/50.

variables.name: LSS_STEERING_ANGLE_END
variables.comment: The steering angle at which the left-to-right bias stops shifting to the end value.

variables.name: LSS_LR_BIAS_END
variables.comment: The left-to-right bias at the ending steering angle.

variables.name: REGEN_LIGHT_REQUEST
variables.comment: The ratio of regen to request when a single paddle is depressed.

variables.name: REGEN_HARD_REQUEST
variables.comment: The ratio of regen to request when both paddles are depressed.

variables.name: REGEN_CUTOFF_THRESHOLD
variables.comment: The pedal position at which to stop requesting regen.

variables.name: REGEN_DERATING_SPEED_END
variables.comment: The wheel speed at which no regen should be requested.

variables.name: REGEN_DERATING_SPEED_START
variables.comment: The wheel speed at which to start derating regen requests.

variables.name: SAS_ENABLED
variables.comment: Enables / disables the steering-angle sensor (0 => disabled, 1 => enabled).

variables.name: SAS_ADDR
variables.comment: The 7-bit I2C address of the steering-angle-sensor (default 0x00).

variables.name: APPS_1_SAMPLE
variables.comment: The raw sample of APPS-1.

variables.name: APPS_2_SAMPLE
variables.comment: The raw sample of APPS-2.

variables.name: BSE_F_SAMPLE
variables.comment: The raw sample of BSE-F.

variables.name: BSE_R_SAMPLE
variables.comment: The raw sample of BSE-R.

variables.name: SAS_SAMPLE
variables.comment: The raw sample of the SAS. Note the offset is applied.

variables.name: GLV_BATTERY_SAMPLE
variables.comment: The raw sample of the GLV battery ADC.

variables.name: TORQUE_REQUEST_RL
variables.comment: The torque to be requested of the rear-left inverter.

variables.name: TORQUE_REQUEST_RR
variables.comment: The torque to be requested of the rear-right inverter.

variables.name: TORQUE_REQUEST_FL
variables.comment: The torque to be requested of the front-left inverter.

variables.name: TORQUE_REQUEST_FR
variables.comment: The torque to be requested of the front-right inverter.

variables.name: AMK_RESET_REQUEST
variables.comment: Sends an error reset request to all of the AMK inverters.

variables.name: SAS_CONFIG_REG_0
variables.comment: The steering angle sensor's first configuration register (register address 0).

variables.name: SAS_CONFIG_REG_1
variables.comment: The steering angle sensor's second configuration register (register address 1).

variables.name: SAS_CONFIG_REG_2
variables.comment: The steering angle sensor's third configuration register (register address 2).

variables.name: SAS_CONFIG_REG_3
variables.comment: The steering angle sensor's fourth configuration register (register address 3).

variables.name: SAS_RELATIVE_POS_REG
variables.comment: The steering angle sensor's relative position output register (register address 32).

variables.name: SAS_ABSOLUTE_POS_REG
variables.comment: The steering angle sensor's absolute position output register (register address 33).

variables.name: SAS_STATUS_REG
variables.comment: The steering angle sensor's status output register (register address 34).

variables.name: SAS_TACHO_REG
variables.comment: The steering angle sensor's tachometer output register (register address 35).
